entry.title: How to evaluate the suspension of the China Basketball Association with the NBA Rockets?
entry.content: Compared with the United States, China is also forming a politically correct atmosphere with the same Chinese characteristics as the United States. Therefore, since you are in the United States or have any form of relationship with the United States, you must strictly abide by the political correctness of the United States. Then, if you are in China or have any form of relationship with China, you must also abide by China’s political correctness. Among them, we must not support any form of Chinese separatistism, and it is the most important one in China’s political correctness. Similarly, you can’t support people who eat pork in the Islamic world. You can’t support people who eat beef in India. You can’t support the Nazi Party in Israel. You can’t support apartheid in South Africa. Here are just the most extreme examples. It does not mean that other places should support Nazis or apartheids. So please don’t misinterpret.) You cannot support Northern Ireland separatists in the UK. Some of these are incorporated into the law, and some are just customary. These political correctness, as long as you are on the earth, and want to have some connections with these countries, then you have to be careful and cautious. Otherwise, you violate these political corrects and you have to pay the price. This is fair.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: 粉笔考公资料分享
entry.content: 目前，由于毛衣站等因素的影响，全球经济正处于下降趋势。作为生活在地球村上的我们，覆巢之下，焉有完卵。各行各业必然会过上勒紧裤腰带过苦日子的生活，而这种情况下，公务员或许是逆风情况下的最佳选择了。我是一个刚毕业的大学生，参加了2019南方某省的公务员省考，并成功上岸。因为我曾经在互联网上得到过一些前辈和同学的无私的帮助和指导，所以我觉得有必要将这种互相帮助的精神传承下去。嗯，所以我打算分享一些学习资料供大家参考下。 1、粉笔申论真题https://tc5.us/dir/20023828-35557493-870703 2、粉笔行测真题https://tc5.us/dir/20023828-35557520-21a164 3、申论的规矩https://tc5.us/file/20023828-397938975 各位可以下载电子版进行学习，看看粉笔资源是否适合自己，避免了直接购买实体书而发现不适合从而造成金钱浪费。 因为百度网盘上传速度有点慢，所以我使用了一个比较小众的城通网盘提高上传速度。不过城通网盘的问题就是，下载速度不快，但是每本电子书也不大，各位直接在网页下载就行了，不必特地使用城通网盘的app我还搞了一个微信公众号，准备有空了就分享一些考公资源等，名字叫做“一级退堂鼓演奏家”，欢迎大家关注
